title.bibl: Svenska Tribunen, Aug. 17, 1892. He Believed in Education

div.bibl: Svenska Tribunen, Aug. 17, 1892. HE BELIEVED IN EDUCATION

body.p: Our countryman August Hoglund passed away last Thursday in his home, 13 Otis St., at an age of nearly 66. He was a tailor by trade and had been a resident of Chicago since 1869. He is survived by his widow, five sons, one daughter and four grand-children.

All of his children were given a good education. Of the three oldest sons, Charles is a Justice of the Peace here in Chicago, John a Lawyer, also in Chicago, and Frank the City Clerk of Rockford, Ill.
